languages.text: "Сколько себя помню, я всегда жила по Завету Паутины. Делала то, что велено. И не умею иначе. Но, быть может... это и оказалось уязвимым местом в доспехах моей души. Я обдумаю сказанное тобой, Домин'{name}".

"I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "Сколько себя помню, я всегда жила по Завету Паутины. Делала то, что велено. И не умею иначе. Но, быть может... это и оказалось уязвимым местом в доспехах моей души. Я обдумаю сказанное тобой, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: "For as long as I can remember, I have lived by the word of Ahn'shini. I did as I was told. I know of no other way. But perhaps... that was the opening in the armour of my soul. I will think on what you have said, Enim'{name}."

"For as long as I can remember, I have lived by the word of Ahn'shini. I did as I was told. I know of no other way. But perhaps... that was the opening in the armour of my soul. I will think on what you have said, Enim'{name}."

"I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you have said, Domin'{name}."

"I have lived according to the Way of Ahn'shini for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you have said, Enim'{name}."

"I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."

"I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you have said, Domin'{name}."

"I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you have said, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: «He vivido de acuerdo con la Doctrina de la Red Sanguinolenta desde que tengo uso de razón. Es lo que me fue encomendado. Nunca he conocido otra cosa. Pero... quizá sea ese el punto débil en la coraza de mi alma. Pensaré en lo que me ha dicho, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: «He vivido de acuerdo con la Doctrina de la Red Sanguinolenta desde que tengo uso de razón. Es lo que me fue encomendado. Nunca he conocido otra cosa. Pero... quizá sea ese el punto débil en la coraza de mi alma. Pensaré en lo que me ha dicho, Domin'{name}».

languages.text: 「私は物心がついたころから、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの教義に従って生きてきた。そうするように言われていたから。他の方法は知らなかった。でも、もしかすると…これが私の魂の鎧の弱点だったのかもしれない。あなたが言ったことを考えてみよう、ドミン・{name}」
languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: 「私は物心がついたころから、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの教義に従って生きてきた。そうするように言われていたから。他の方法は知らなかった。でも、もしかすると…これが私の魂の鎧の弱点だったのかもしれない。あなたが言ったことを考えてみよう、ドミン・{name}」
「私は物心がついたころから、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの教義に従って生きてきた。そうするように言われていたから。他の方法は知らなかった。でも、もしかすると…これが私の魂の鎧の弱点だったのかもしれない。あなたが言ったことを考えてみよう、ドミン・{name}」

languages.text: “从我记事起，我就一直遵循着织血罗网的教义，这就是我所了解的一切。我从来不知道这世上还有其他道路，但或许……这就是我灵魂中的弱点。我要好好考虑你说的话，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: “从我记事起，我就一直遵循着织血罗网的教义，这就是我所了解的一切。我从来不知道这世上还有其他道路，但或许……这就是我灵魂中的弱点。我要好好考虑你说的话，秘者{name}。”

languages.text: Ich habe nach den Grundsätzen des Blutgesponnenen Netzes gelebt, solange ich denken kann. Wie es mir gesagt wurde. Ich kannte keinen anderen Weg. Aber vielleicht ... war das die Schwäche in der Rüstung meiner Seele. Ich werde über Eure Worte nachdenken, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: Ich habe nach den Grundsätzen des Blutgesponnenen Netzes gelebt, solange ich denken kann. Wie es mir gesagt wurde. Ich kannte keinen anderen Weg. Aber vielleicht ... war das die Schwäche in der Rüstung meiner Seele. Ich werde über Eure Worte nachdenken, Domin'{name}."

Ich habe nach den Grundsätzen des Blutgesponnenen Netzes gelebt, solange ich denken kann. Wie es mir gesagt wurde. Ich kannte keinen anderen Weg. Aber vielleicht ... war das die Schwäche in der Rüstung meiner Seele. Ich werde über Eure Worte nachdenken, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: « J'observe les Préceptes de la Toile de Sang depuis ma plus tendre enfance. C'est ce qu'on m'a toujours dit de faire, et je n'ai jamais rien connu d'autre. Mais en fin de compte... peut-être n'était-ce qu'une faille dans l'armure de mon âme. Je vais réfléchir à vos paroles, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: « J'observe les Préceptes de la Toile de Sang depuis ma plus tendre enfance. C'est ce qu'on m'a toujours dit de faire, et je n'ai jamais rien connu d'autre. Mais en fin de compte... peut-être n'était-ce qu'une faille dans l'armure de mon âme. Je vais réfléchir à vos paroles, Domin'{name}. »

languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you have said, Domin'."

languages.text: "Kendimi bildim bileli Kanipi Ağı'nın İlkeleri'ne göre yaşadım. Bana bu öğretildi. Başka türlüsünü bilmem. Fakat belki de... Ruhumun zırhındaki zaaf buydu. Bu dediklerini değerlendireceğim Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: "I have lived according to the Tenets of the Bloodspun Web for as long as I can remember. It is what I was told to do. I knew no other way. But perhaps... this was the weakness in my soul's armour. I will think on what you've said, Domin'{name}."
